name: Kryptonite-TheBitcoin-Machine
0:
”Alexa, ask Kryptonite Machine how much is currently being offered for Bitcoin in dollar”
”Alexa, ask Kryptonite Machine how much is fifty Bitcoin in dollars”
”Alexa, ask Kryptonite Machine how high is the Bitcoin currently in dollar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kryptonite machine
des:
Do you have any questions about Bitcoin?
Maybe questions about the current price in EUR or USD?
Or do you just want to work out how much x Bitcoin is in EUR / USD? (or the other way around)

➡ No problem, then just use the smart crypto currency machine "Kryptonite" with LIVE data (accurate to the second)!

NOW FOR FREE:
You can also get the current status at the ASK, BID, LOWEST, HIGHEST price.

NEW:
Feature added - Get today's first prize
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
